participant_1.background:
I am from a small town in the Midwest where life is slower and more relaxed.
I've been at my current job for 3 years.
I'm not as open about my interests as I would like to be, but I love baseball and fishing.
i am hoping to play.
I'm a proud dog dad to my two puppies.

participant_2.background:
I am a police officer who has to run after criminals in my boots, but I still enjoy playing basketball in my free time.
I listen to jazz because it's a timeless genre that's perfect for relaxing in my vintage-styled home.
i own a small farm where i herd cattle.
zebras are my favorite animals.
My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating.

content.text: I am doing great! How are you?
I am doing well! I am excited to be talking to you! I love hearing about people's interests!
That's great to hear! I am glad that you are excited! I love meeting new people and learning about their interests as well!
What do you like to do in your free time?
I love to play basketball and listen to jazz music. I also enjoy spending time on my farm with my cattle.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love basketball too, but I don't have the time to play it as much as I would like. I have two puppies that I love to spend time with.
Puppies are so cute! I love animals, but I don't have any pets of my own right now. I do have a suburban that I love to take on road trips, but the weather hasn't been cooperating lately.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I would love to go on a road trip sometime. I'm from a small town in the Midwest, so I'm used to the slow pace of life.
That sounds like a beautiful place to live! I'm from a big city, so I love the hustle and bustle of life.
It is a beautiful place to live! I'm glad that you love the hustle and bustle of life. I think that it's important to find a place that you love to live.
I agree! I'm happy that you're happy where you live. It's important to be happy!
I am happy! I'm glad that you're happy too! We should continue talking sometime!
I'd love to! We should exchange numbers
